sections.heading: Performance
sections.text: and payment bonds: Amount; conditions; filing with contracting body.

sections.heading: Certified
sections.text:
copies of payment bonds and contracts to be furnished applicant by contracting

body; fee; copies as prima facie evidence.

sections.heading: Actions
sections.text: on payment bonds: Venue; limitation of actions.

sections.heading: Requirement
sections.text:
that bonds be furnished by particular surety company or through particular

agent or broker unlawful; penalty.
